abstract.t: This document specifies the procedure for creating a binding between a DHCPv4/DHCPv6 assigned IP address and a binding anchor on a SAVI (Source Address Validation Improvements) device. The bindings set up by this procedure is used to filter out packets with forged source IP address in DHCP scenario. This mechanism is proposed as a complement to ingress filtering to provide finer-grained source IP address validation.
